Your daily dosis of Life Pro Tips!

A Life Pro Tip (or LPT) is a tip that improves life for you and those around you in a specific and significant way.

Note: this extension is meant to be taken in a joking, satirical manner. Please don't actually follow any of this advice. You should know this already.
